item.title: Picom: A lightweight compositor for X11
item.author: yanboyang713@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Boyang Yan
item.description: picom picom is a standalone compositor for Xorg, suitable for use with window managers that do not provide compositing. picom is a fork of compton, which is a fork of xcompmgr-dana, which in turn is a fork of xcompmgr. 1 yay -S picom
